notwarning.notwarning-1: .*[Ii]f you wanted to set the \-\-build type
notwarning.notwarning-9: ^checking maximum warning verbosity option... -Wall for C

error.error-5: ^\!\!\!\sAll ebuilds that could satisfy.*\shave been masked.

badpassword.badpassword-2: ^Just what do you think you're doing Dave?
badpassword.badpassword-3: ^ It can only be attributed to human error.
badpassword.badpassword-4: ^That's something I cannot allow to happen.
badpassword.badpassword-5: ^My mind is going. I can feel it.
badpassword.badpassword-6: ^Sorry about this, I know it's a bit silly.
badpassword.badpassword-7: ^Take a stress pill and think things over.
badpassword.badpassword-8: ^This mission is too important for me to allow you to jeopardize it.
badpassword.badpassword-12: ^And you call yourself a Rocket Scientist!
badpassword.badpassword-15: ^My pet ferret can type better than you!
badpassword.badpassword-18: ^Your mind just hasn't been the same since the electro-shock, has it?
badpassword.badpassword-19: ^Maybe if you used more than just two fingers...
badpassword.badpassword-20: ^BOB says: You seem to have forgotten your passwd, enter another!
badpassword.badpassword-22: ^I can't hear you -- I'm using the scrambler.
badpassword.badpassword-23: ^The more you drive -- the dumber you get.
badpassword.badpassword-24: ^Listen, broccoli brains, I don't have time to listen to this trash.
badpassword.badpassword-25: ^Listen, burrito brains, I don't have time to listen to this trash.
badpassword.badpassword-26: ^I've seen penguins that can type better than that.
badpassword.badpassword-27: ^Have you considered trying to match wits with a rutabaga?
badpassword.badpassword-28: ^You speak an infinite deal of nothing
badpassword.badpassword-31: ^We'll all be murdered in our beds!
badpassword.badpassword-32: ^You can't come in. Our tiger has got flu
badpassword.badpassword-34: ^... and it used to be so popular...
badpassword.badpassword-35: ^Pauses for audience applause, not a sausage
badpassword.badpassword-36: ^Hold it up to the light --- not a brain in sight!
badpassword.badpassword-39: ^There's a lot of it about, you know.
badpassword.badpassword-40: ^You do that again and see what happens...
badpassword.badpassword-42: ^Harm can come to a young lad like that!
badpassword.badpassword-44: ^I think ... err ... I think ... I think I'll go home
